title: Bolton Indicted, Trump and Zelenskyy Meeting, Rebuilding Gaza

title: Trump and Zelenskyy meet again
short_opening: In the last few days, President Trump has met separately with the presidents of Russia and Ukraine, in an attempt to break the deadlock and end the war.Today__ meeting at the White House between Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy seemed to go much better than last time, when Zelenskyy left early after a heated argument in the Oval Office. In fact, Zelenskyy hailed today__ meeting as __he best one_ yet.Even so, the next steps to ending the war are unclear. Russian President Vladimir Putin and Zelenskyy still haven__ met face-to-face to negotiate, and it__ not certain whether they will be able to find common ground.NPR White House correspondent Danielle Kurtzleben gives an update on the day__ events, and former national security adviser Susan Rice gives her perspective on the likelihood of a deal.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

label: Media Representation

title: Latest in Ukraine: Zelenskyy scores F-16 training, as Russia claims to take Bakhmut
short_opening: By President Biden walks with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy ahead of a working session on Ukraine during the Group of Seven summit in Hiroshima, Japan, Sunday. In a win for the Ukrainian leader, Biden supported training Ukraine's pilots to fly F-16s.Susan Walsh/APhide caption
label: Military Operations

title: Zelenskyy's recent diplomatic moves signal a new phase for the war in Ukraine
short_opening: A look at Ukrainian President Zelenskyy's diplomatic push and what it might mean for the the next phase of the war in Ukraine.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: Zelenskyy denies Moscow's claims that Russian forces are occupying Bakhmut
short_opening: HIROSHIMA, Japan  Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said Sunday that Russian forces weren't occupying Bakhmut, casting doubt on Moscow's insistence that the eastern Ukrainian city had fallen.
label: Russia-Related Rhetoric

title: Zelenskyy meets world leaders at G-7
short_opening: Ukraine's president Zelenskyy has joined President Biden and G-7 leaders in Hiroshima to talk about Russia's war. The summit also includes discussion about China, North Korea and denuclearization.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: Zelenskyy Attends G-7 Summit, Wall Street & Default, Greek Elections
short_opening: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy arrives in Hiroshima, Japan. Markets don't seem very concerned about political wrangling over the debt ceiling. Greek voters head to the polls Sunday for elections clouded by a deadly train crash.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: Zelenskyy arrives at G-7 summit in Japan as leaders ramp up pressure on Russia
short_opening: HIROSHIMA, Japan and KYIV, Ukraine  Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy arrived in Hiroshima, Japan, on Saturday to attend the group of seven leading industrial nations' summit as member states intensify sanctions on Russia.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy will attend the G-7 meeting in person
short_opening: Zelenskyy's expected appearance on Sunday comes as Western allies harden their resolve in support of Ukraine. Russia's military aggression toward its neighbor is on top of the G-7 summit's agenda.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: Zelenskyyarrives at Arab League summit, as Saudi Arabia flexes diplomatic muscle
short_opening: Aya Batrawy In this photo provided by the Saudi Press Agency, SPA, leaders of Arab countries pose for a group picture ahead of the Arab summit in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, Friday.Saudi Press Agency via APhide caption

title: Latest on Ukraine:Zelenskyymade a spring diplomatic offensive in Europe (May 15)
short_opening: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak (right) walks with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy to a waiting Chinook helicopter after meetings at Chequers, the U.K. leader's country retreat, in Aylesbury, England, on Monday.Carl Court/Getty Imageshide caption British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak (right) walks with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy to a waiting Chinook helicopter after meetings at Chequers, the U.K. leader's country retreat, in Aylesbury, England, on Monday.

title: Ukraine's PresidentZelenskyyis in Germany for the first time since Russia invaded
short_opening: BERLIN (AP)  Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said Sunday that his country is preparing a counteroffensive designed to liberate areas occupied by Russia, not to attack Russian territory.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: PresidentZelenskyymeets with the pope at the Vatican
short_opening: ROME  Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy held talks with Pope Francis at the Vatican on Saturday, saying it was a great honor to meet with the pontiff, who has previously offered to do what he can to try to end the war launched by Russia's invasion of Ukraine a year ago.
label: Media Representation

title: China's Xi calls Ukraine'sZelenskyy, after weeks of intensifying pressure to do so
short_opening: Chinese leader Xi Jinping called Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy, over a month after Xi's summit in Moscow with Russia's leader Vladimir Putin.

title: Japan's prime minister arrives in Ukraine for talks with PresidentZelenskyy
short_opening: KYIV, Ukraine  Japanese Prime Minister Fumio Kishida began a surprise visit to Ukraine early Tuesday, hours after Chinese President Xi Jinping arrived in neighboring Russia for a three-day visit. The dueling summits come as the longtime rivals are on diplomatic offensives.
label: Diplomatic Engagements

title: A year since Russia invaded,Zelenskyysays Ukraine needs the support of the world

title: Biden hears Zelenskyy's plan for peace with Russia during surprise visit to Kyiv
short_opening: Joanna Kakissis President Biden visited Kyiv just shy of a year since Russia invaded Ukraine. He spent time with President Zelenskyy, who called this visit the most important in U.S.-Ukrainian history.

title: Volodymyr Zelenskyy went from comedian to icon of democracy. This is how he did it
short_opening: This week marks one year since Russia invaded Ukraine in February of 2022. And in the past year, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has undergone a dramatic political transformation.

title: Why Zelenskyy visited the U.K. nearly 1 year into Russia's war on Ukraine
short_opening: LONDON  Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has made a surprise visit to the United Kingdom, one of his very rare trips outside Ukraine since Russia invaded the country nearly one year ago.

title: President Zelenskyy shakes up Ukraine's Cabinet amid corruption allegations
short_opening: KYIV, Ukraine  A string of resignations, dismissals and reassignments shook Ukraine's government Monday and Tuesday, as Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and other leaders of the government confirmed the shake-up of high-level positions.

title: Zelenskyy aims to shore up support with White House, Congress and American people

title: Zelenskyyaide gives insight on war in Ukraine in 'The Fight for Our Lives'

title: Zelenskyy has consolidated Ukraine's TV outlets and dissolved rival political parties
short_opening: President Zelenskyy has consolidated all TV platforms in Ukraine into one state broadcast and restricted political rivals. Political opposition fears such civil liberty constraints could continue.

title: European leaders meet with Ukrainian President Zelenskyy to show unity and support
short_opening: Four European leaders are meeting Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in talks intended as a show of European unity. Also, the U.S. ambassador tells NPR she expects "a long, grinding, tough war."

title: Ukraine's Zelenskyy hosts European leaders, welcomes more U.S. weapons
short_opening: KYIV, Ukraine  Four European leaders took the train to Ukraine's capital Thursday and met President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in a show of unity for a country struggling to hold back the Russian military.
